name: Warriors of Fate
description: Warriors of Fate, known in Japan as Tenchi o Kurau 2: Sekiheki no Tatakai (Japanese: 天地を喰らう2 赤壁の戦い, Hepburn: "The Devouring of Heaven and Earth II: Battle of Red Cliffs"), is a side-scrolling beat-'em-up produced by Capcom released as a coin-operated arcade game in 1992. It is the second arcade game based on the Tenchi wo Kurau manga, following Dynasty Wars.
